org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.jmx

Class WebMBeanAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.jmx.WebMBeanAdapter

  • public class WebMBeanAdapter
extends Object
    The WebMBeanAdapter is used to query MBean Attributes and Operations using web-friendly names. It should be noted that by creating a web interface the JMX beans bypasses the JMX security mechanisms that are built into the JVM. If there is a need to limit access to the JMX beans then the web interface will need to be secured.

      • WebMBeanAdapter

        public WebMBeanAdapter(MBeanServer mBeanServer,
                       String mBeanName,
                       String encoding)
                throws JMException,
                       UnsupportedEncodingException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        mBeanServer - the MBeanServer.
        mBeanName - the MBean name (can be URL-encoded).
        encoding - the string encoding to be used (i.e. UTF-8)
        Throws:
        JMException - Java Management Exception
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding is not supported.

      • getOperationInfo

        public MBeanOperationInfo getOperationInfo(String operationName)
                                    throws org.fishwife.jrugged.spring.jmx.OperationNotFoundException,
                                           UnsupportedEncodingException
        Get the Operation metadata for a single operation on an MBean by name.
        Parameters:
        operationName - the Operation name (can be URL-encoded).
        Returns:
        the MBeanOperationInfo for the operation.
        Throws:
        OperationNotFoundException - Method was not found
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding is not supported.

      • getAttributeValues

        public Map<String,Object> getAttributeValues()
                                      throws AttributeNotFoundException,
                                             InstanceNotFoundException,
                                             ReflectionException
        Get all the attribute values for an MBean by name. The values are HTML escaped.
        Returns:
        the Map of attribute names and values.
        Throws:
        AttributeNotFoundException - Unable to find the 'attribute'
        InstanceNotFoundException - unable to find the specific bean
        ReflectionException - unable to interrogate the bean

      • getAttributeValue

        public String getAttributeValue(String attributeName)
                         throws JMException,
                                UnsupportedEncodingException
        Get the value for a single attribute on an MBean by name.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the attribute name (can be URL-encoded).
        Returns:
        the value as a String.
        Throws:
        JMException - Java Management Exception
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding is not supported.

      • invokeOperation

        public String invokeOperation(String operationName,
                              Map<String,String[]> parameterMap)
                       throws JMException,
                              UnsupportedEncodingException
        Invoke an operation on an MBean by name. Note that only basic data types are supported for parameter values.
        Parameters:
        operationName - the operation name (can be URL-encoded).
        parameterMap - the Map of parameter names and value arrays.
        Returns:
        the returned value from the operation.
        Throws:
        JMException - Java Management Exception
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding is not supported.
